statuses.x: Package does not function at all or prevents the world loading
statuses.g: Package works without issue or an updated version is available
statuses.a: Archived - Package may still function but is not actively maintained
statuses.u: Unknown status - Package may not be in the official listing
statuses.c: Marked as compatible by developer in manifest

mcc.title: Title
mcc.error: Please try again. If this issue persists, please report an issue on GitHub.
mcc.moduleManagementColorsExplanation: The background colors below are used to indicate the status of the module in the latest Foundry VTT version. Open the Module Compatibility Checker with the button below for more info.
mcc.percentageTooltip: The percentage of visible packages that are ready to be used on the selected Foundry VTT version.
mcc.reminder: Please remember that module and system developers are volunteers, they have their own lives and schedules and just because they have not yet updated doesn't mean they never will. Patience is important! Devs are human too.
